strings: The crown is stuck and won't budge.

<voice_0x01000E30><se_low>*: H-Help! Somebody! Anybody!?
Get this crown off me!

<voice_0x01000E31><se_low>*: I'm down here! Look!
I'm right next to your foot!
<voice_0x01000E32><se_low>*: I was bouncing up and down at the top of the well, but I fell in and now I can't get out! Help me!

<voice_0x01000E33><se_low>*: Pull that crown off me and set me free!
You'll have to give it some welly, though!
It's stuck fast!

<voice_0x01000E37><se_low>*: You changed your mind!
You're going to help me now, right!?

<voice_0x01000E34><se_low>*: Thank you! All you have to do is pull
the crown off me! No need to be gentle.
Just tug at it really hard!

<voice_0x01000E35><se_high>*: Well done!
Here, you have the silly crown!
It's your reward! (Slurp)
<Cap><leader> receives the slime crown and puts it in the bag.
